section.15: The Book of Shortening the Prayer When Traveling

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"I prayed two rak'ahs with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) in Mina, and two rak'ahs with Abu Bakr, may Allah (SWT) be pleased with him, and two rak'ahs with Umar, may Allah (ﷺ) be pleased with him
